name: Dreamer Series: Shop Owner
description:
Let's Play: Shops is another game of the Let's Play brand. This Deep Silver's brand gives the possibility to girls between 6 and 12 years old to discover the basics of some dream jobs for girls.

The player acts alternately as a young florist, a baker and a grocer to discover the various professions around the universe of the shop keeper.

The game is composed of 15 mini games which are grouped together in three different categories.
  • Florist: cut and design flower arrangements, Kill aphids, Pruning plants, Cash register and sales, Watering and growing flowers.

  • Baker: measure ingredients and knead the dough, bake the bread, roll out the dough and flatten the dough into baguettes, decorate the cake with icing.

  • Grocer: serving fruit, managing stock, customer requests vegetables in specific unit/weight measurements, stock shelves correctly and moving objects to their rightful place, manage the checkout counter using the scanner.
All mini games are only playable with the stylus and with only one player.
